sn10.7:1.4: This is another ode to the maternal love of the female yakkha.
sn10.7:2.2: Punabbasu is a lunar mansion or asterism, roughly equivalent to Gemini. The child is probably named after the asterism, which suggests Uttarā was too; there are three asterisms with Uttara in their names (cf. DN 14:1.12.15).
